Docs.summary: Determines whether this trivia has any diagnostics on it. If this trivia is a structured trivia then the returned value will indicate whether this trivia or any of its descendant nodes, tokens or trivia have any diagnostics on them.

Docs.summary: Returns the full string representation of this trivia. If this trivia is structured trivia then the returned string will include any leading or trailing trivia present on the StructuredTriviaSyntax node of this trivia.
Docs.returns: The full string representation of this trivia.
Docs.remarks: The length of the returned string is always the same as FullSpan.Length
